entry.title: 自我介紹
entry.content:
基本資料

雲林人，目前已在台北動物園附設國立大學大學部求學 4 年，和碩班 1 年半ㄌ，接下來也會繼續在這邊待上一陣子唸研究所
現年 23 歲，獸齡 2 年

關於設定


境穆的毛色以深紺色和白色為主，耳朵跟手是栗色，眼睛則是湖水綠，然後是一隻邊境牧羊犬喔！雖然職業是偵探，但很常不務正業，跑去別人家串門子

基本資料

  • 大學就讀外交學系，畢業後目前在本系讀外交所，並同時準備外交特考，希望最後征服宇宙 ùwú
  • 雖然曾經碰過一年德文，但已經是曾經ㄌ，然後大四三心二意地跑去修法文跟西文…可能只是單純覺得學外文跟了解外國文化很好玩ㄅ有機會也想學學看俄文，但首先要先學會發出彈舌音（rr…r…
  • 過去曾在辯論圈打混摸魚尸位素餐，但有吸收到一點天地精華（？），也有拿到幾個獎項跟最佳辯士醬

興趣愛好

  1. ㄘ好吃的跟喝酒（可能無法千杯不醉，但可以試試看
  2. 電玩遊戲（雖然主要只玩過 TF2 跟 AOE 4，但來，都來
  3. 貓和犬（擼
  4. 交朋朋（大家都是捧油！

我的雷點

其實還好，只要大家都是正常人，就沒問題ㄌ XDD

我可能會雷到你的地方

  1. 訊息可能會回一大串，造成你的視力衰退（？
  2. 有時會蹦出一些正式詞彙（ㄅ歉我不是故意的，只是過去經驗使然，直覺就想到這些
  3. 不太常發文（但我還活著ㄛ

認識我你將獲得

  • 呃…國際關係小知識？
  • 可能潛在說不定有機率的幹話與 Social Credits

如果能和大家交上朋友那就太好了！

entry.title: Self Introduction
entry.content:
Basic Info

Hey there! I’m Vincent Frontier, a Taiwanese furry currently pursuing master’s degree in international relations in National Chengchi University.

I have been in Taiwanese furry fandom for about 1 and half year (starting in late December of 2022). Not really a long time XD

  • I major in international relations in Department of Diplomacy, National Chengchi University, and had acquired bachelor’s degree so far.
    Currently I am a graduate in master’s degree of the same major, and preparing for the diplomat exam at the same time ùwú
  • I had learnt German for like an year, but it was three years ago, when I was a sophomore. And when I was a senior, I tried to learn French as well as Spanish for also an year. I found it really interesting to learn not only the foreign languages but the foreign cultures!
    I hope that one day I could also learn some Russian, but before that I gotta learn how to make voiced alveolar trill (rr… r…
  • I used to play debate for a few years, and somehow managed to get some prizes from 1st place to best personal debater XD

My Fursona


My fur comprises 3 different colours: navy blue (深紺色), white as well as maroon (栗色).

My eye colour is marrs green (湖水綠).

I am a border collie :3 and a detective.

Hobbies and Interests

  1. Having delicious food and good wines
  2. PC gaming (e.g., Team Fortress 2, Age of Empires 4)
  3. Felis and canine (Border Collie is of course my favourite UwU)
  4. Hanging out with friends, and making new friends!

A little more about me

My bottomline

Not really though XD

As long as you are a normal human being, I think we will surely get along well~

Something I might accidentally offend you with

  1. Sometimes my reply might be very lengthy
  2. Sometimes I would use formal terms in Chinese, which could cause you trouble comprehending what I would like to say
  3. Only posting on Facebook and / or Twitter (X) once in a blue moon (but I’m still alive XD

If we become friends, you might get…

  • Some knowledge regarding international relations (?
  • Possible Social Credits

I sincerely look forward to making friends with you UwU
